abstract: Marcelo Nicolás Lodeiro Benítez (Spanish pronunciation: [nikoˈlas loˈðeiɾo]; born 21 March 1989), commonly known as Nicolás Lodeiro, is a Uruguayan footballer who currently plays for Botafogo.
comment: Marcelo Nicolás Lodeiro Benítez (Spanish pronunciation: [nikoˈlas loˈðeiɾo]; born 21 March 1989), commonly known as Nicolás Lodeiro, is a Uruguayan footballer who currently plays for Botafogo.
name: Lodeiro, Nicolás Lounici
